Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the type A lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus, Staphylococcus aureus, Peptostreptococcus micros, Pediococcus acidilactici, Clostridium sporogenes, Corynebacterium diphtheriae, Actinomyces viscosus, Gardnerella vaginalis, Propionibacterium acnes, Listeria monocytogenes, Mycobacterium smegmatis.Gram-negative bacteria:Campylobacter jejuni, Helicobacter pylori, Neisseria gonorrhoeae.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Mutacin-2 inhibits other mutans streptococci as well as many gram-positive exogenous pathogens. Transiently and partially depolarizes the transmembrane electrical potential and pH gradient of susceptible cells, inhibits the uptake of amino acids and depletes the intracellular ATP pool.
Sequence Information.Biophysicochemical properties: pH dependence (Stable from pH 4.0 to 10.0); Temperature dependence (Thermostable).
Sequence Information.PTM: There are one didehydrobutyrine (T25), two lanthionines (S12-C26; S19-C27) and one Beta-methyllanthionine (T10-C15).
